original_text: Then they went in to King Hezekiah and reported: “We have purified the entire temple of the Lord, the altar of burnt offering with all its utensils, and the table for setting out the consecrated bread, with all its articles.
korean_text: 안으로 들어가서 히스기야 왕을 보고 이르되 우리가 여호와의 온 전과 번제단과 그 모든 그릇들과 떡을 진설하는 상과 그 모든 그릇들을 깨끗하게 하였고

sentences.original_text: Then they went in to King Hezekiah
We have purified the entire temple of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 주의 성전 전체를 정결케 하였습니다

sentences.original_text: the altar of burnt offering with all its utensils
and the table for setting out the consecrated bread
